amendatorysection.catchline: Class I school district; organization of new district; first officers; term.
amendatorysection.para: When a new Class I school district is organized and officers are elected at any other time than at the annual meeting, the time intervening between the date of organization and the beginning of the next school year shall constitute the first year in the term of such officers.

annotation.para: First year of respective terms includes period of time elapsing from date of organization meeting and election of trustees up to time of holding of first annual meeting. State ex rel. Davis v. Clarke, 108 Neb. 638, 188 N.W. 472 (1922).
